document.full_text: tears flowed at one of beijing's biggest "house" churches when some 300 chinese christians prayed on the last sunday before they face eviction from their makeshift place of worship, pressed by officials wary about religion outside of their grip.
document.title: beijing church faces eviction in tense times
lines_and_colors: tears flowed at one of beijing's biggest "house" churches when some 300 chinese christians prayed on the last sunday before they face eviction from their makeshift place of worship, pressed by officials wary about religion outside of their grip.
